content: **gammy shawl crochet pattern** a stunning accessory for anyone and everyone crochet using the classic granny square pattern it features an elegant long fringe or if you choose a shell border perfect for adding a touch of warmth and style to any outfit **size** one size dimensions length 65 /162 cm center depth 32 /81 cm **yarn** worsted weight cascade yarns 220 superwash aran wave 100% superwash wool 110g 3 5 oz / 150 yds 137 5 m color solar 108 6 hanks approximately 800yds 732m **crochet hook** us i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge **notions** scissors tapestry needle 6 cardboard for cutting tassel strips **gauge** over 4 = 16 double_crochet and 5 25 row unblocked
